FuncDef: The display vlan statistics command displays statistics about both sent and received packets on all interfaces in a specified VLAN. The display vlan statistics command displays statistics about both sent and received packets on all interfaces in a specified VLAN.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays packet statistics on all interfaces in a specified VLAN.
For the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ:The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.
For the CE6885-LL (low latency mode):The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1023.

Displays packet statistics of a board in a specified slot.
-

ExtraInfo: If a VLAN contains multiple interfaces, run the display vlan statistics command to view packet statistics of all interfaces in the VLAN. The command output helps you analyze interface faults.
